channel.title: Commands Command [Delta]
channel.description: How do I make a commands command on delta? I'm new to this sorry for the stupid questions.

item.title: Commands Command [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”] public void commands() { sendQuest("TITLE", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("TEXT", 8147); sendQuest("TEXT", 8148); sendQuest("TEXT", 8149); sendQuest("TEXT", 8150); sendQuest("TEXT", 8151); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Then:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Commands") { commands(); } [/quote]
Thanks this is exactly what i was looking for

Read full topic

item.title: Commands Command [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND_NAME") { */ What the command does */ } [/quote]
No I know how to do that I wanna make a command that shows an interface showing what the commands are.

Read full topic
